text: "Fernando" is a song from the Swedish music group ABBA. It was released in March 1976. The song is one of ABBA's best selling singles. It sold over six million copies in 1976 alone. The song is available in the Spanish, Swedish and English languages. "Fernando" hit #1 in Germany, Ireland, Australia, Belgium and Switzerland. ==References== Category:Pop songs Category:ABBA songs Category:1976 songs Category:Cher songs
title: Fernando (song)
